mapper.select: select count(c.member_id) from ( select idx ,member_id ,description ,team_num ,regdate ,is_selection ,(select count(temporary) from n_answers b where b.subject_id = ${subject_id} AND b.member_id = a.member_id) temporary from n_monitors a where subject_id = ${subject_id} )c where temporary = 0 AND is_selection = 'Y'

select c.*, to_char(rn1) rn from ( select member_id ,team_num ,row_number() over (order by regdate asc) rn1 ,row_number() over (order by regdate desc) rnd ,is_selection ,(select count(temporary) from n_answers b where b.subject_id = ${subject_id} AND b.member_id = a.member_id) temporary ,subject_id ,(select question_cnt from n_subject b where b.subject_id = ${subject_id}) question_cnt ,(select M001_NM from hisip.vw_mem001_m_monitor@sip2 where M001_ID = a.member_id) member_name ,(select job from member where id= a.member_id) job ,(select M001_SSN from hisip.vw_mem001_m_monitor@sip2 where M001_ID = a.member_id) birth ,(select M001_PHONE from hisip.vw_mem001_m_monitor@sip2 where M001_ID = a.member_id) phone from n_monitors a where subject_id = 301 )c where rnd between #{pagingVO.startRow} and #{pagingVO.nextPageRow} AND temporary < question_cnt AND is_selection = 'Y' order by rn1 desc
